<html><body><div><div class="article-body | article w-100"><p class="text | article-text">BLYTHEVILLE, Ark. (KAIT) - A judge set an Illinois woman’s bond at $5 million on a capital murder charge after police arrested her in connection with a <a href="https://www.kait8.com/2025/12/30/police-asking-publics-help-homicide-investigation/" target="_self" rel="" title="https://www.kait8.com/2025/12/30/police-asking-publics-help-homicide-investigation/">homicide</a>.</p><p class="text | article-text">Sgt. Robin Haught-Angel, public information officer for the police department, said police responded Dec. 30, 2025, to an unresponsive person call on the 100 block of West Hardin Street in Blytheville.</p><p class="text | article-text">At the scene, officers found the victim, 38-year-old Carlos Robinson of Blytheville, dead.</p><p class="text | article-text">Police arrested 26-year-old Reanna Gallamore of Marion, Illinois, in connection with the incident and charged her with capital murder on Jan. 30.</p><p class="w-100"></p><figure class="media-item | figure media-item-image article-image w-100"><figcaption class="figure-caption mt-1 px-1"><span class="caption-text">Police arrested 26-year-old Reanna Gallamore of Marion, Illinois, in connection with the incident and charged her with capital murder on Jan. 30. Judge Shannon Langston set Gallamore’s bond at $5 million.</span><span class="caption-credit">(Mississippi County Sheriff's Office)</span></figcaption></figure><p class="text | article-text">Judge Shannon Langston set Gallamore’s bond at $5 million.</p><p class="text | article-text">Police asked the public for help investigating the <a href="https://www.kait8.com/2025/12/30/police-asking-publics-help-homicide-investigation/" target="_self" rel="" title="https://www.kait8.com/2025/12/30/police-asking-publics-help-homicide-investigation/">incident in December</a>.</p><p class="text | article-text">Anyone with information on the incident to contact the Blytheville Police Department’s Criminal Investigations Division at 870-762-0400.</p><p class="text | text-start article-text"><i>To report a typo or correction, please </i><a href="https://www.kait8.com/page/tips/" target="_self" rel="noreferrer"><i>click here</i></a><i>.</i></p><p class="copyright |"><i>Copyright 2026 KAIT. All rights reserved.</i></p></div></div></body></html>
